item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Nov. 23): The Food Issue
item.description: Jane Pauley hosts our annual "Eat, Drink & Be Merry" holiday broadcast exploring all things epicurean! Check out our menu...

item.title: Etiquette lessons for Gen Z professionals
item.description: Itay Hod takes us to a class where young professionals are learning to master their manners.

item.title: Poll shows Americans pessimistic about economy as holiday shopping gets underway
item.description: Holiday shopping is kicking off, and a new CBS News poll shows only 32% of Americans think the economy is in good shape. Shanelle Kaul reports.

item.title: JFK's granddaughter, Tatiana Schlossberg, says she has terminal cancer diagnosis
item.description: Tatiana Schlossberg, who has been married to doctor George Moran since 2017, has two young children.

item.title: U.S. considers dropping leaflets in Venezuela as it ramps up pressure on Maduro
